Who is at risk for Crimean-Congo Hemorrhagic Fever (CCHF)? ?,"Animal herders, livestock workers, and slaughterhouse workers in endemic areas are at risk of CCHF. Healthcare workers in endemic areas are at risk of infection through unprotected contact with infectious blood and body fluids. Individuals and international travelers with contact to livestock in endemic regions may also be exposed.",CDC,Crimean-Congo Hemorrhagic Fever (CCHF)
